TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
It probbly has something to do with commanism

But what's hyphennationalism?

Edited May 14, 2022 by Maria Sirona

Finn-Land

If you fall in a forest, will a tree hear you?

Yes, and not just one.

How do the trees dustinguish bad words from different languages?

By learning every language on the Earth and only understanding their bad words. Then forget about the rest to prevent stack overflow.

How can I get to Sahara Desert from Dessert Airfield on a spaceraft?

Edited May 17, 2022 by AllenLi
There is really no "c" in that word. It's not a typo.

Use Kraken bait, maybe it'll fling you from Earth to Kerbin, or eat you. 

Why do I want MKS when I barely go to space in KSP?

Because there are large modules in MKS, so you can build a pyramid to sky.

Why USI Orion is multi-colored?

Because it's powered by exploding rainbows (which are multi coloured)

Why is ksp laggy?

Kerbals think. It needs time.

Why just one Kerbal can act at once?

They like Shakesperian  Monologues.

Where are the Kerbal Bicycles?

Scattered by Scatterer all around 251m inside Jool's Juice.

How can a Kerbal fall from the event horizon of a blackhole?

By an event happening in the horizon.

Is that answer stupid enough?
Which answer?

The question is the answer.

Is the answer the question?

Yes, it's a reversed time question.

What if take a dialog with answers and questions, and read it backwards, replacing ? and . with each other?

?sdrawkcab ti etirW .siht rewsna ot woH

Was it a purple people eater or a purple people eater?

Eat was an peorple it'er.

How to have a five o'clock when you work till six?

by moving at a speed of ic on the light axis.

What's the distance between these two countries?

N/A, New Zealand does not actually exist. It is just made up to keep Middle Earth's existence a secret so that tourists won't come and ruin it. This also explains where the elves are going, they are going to Australia and transforming into koalas, emus and kangaroos. The LOTR movies are actually documentaries disguised as mere movies.

 

To prove me true, answer this: have you ever been to New Zealand? Do you know anyone from New Zealand? Are you a paid actor to keep the existence of Middle Earth a secret and support the false belief of New Zealand actually existing?

I have never been even to Old Zealand, why should I need an upgrade?

Are they going to film a LOTR prequel about Numenor in New Zealand, too?

Yes, everything is shot there.

Who is on first?

I don't know who is on first. I do know Jeb is cursed. (to be the most-flown Kerbalnaut among all Kerbals)

How can you go to the ISS after it is finally considered outdated and deorbited?

With scuba gear.

When Numenor portrayed by New Zealand gets sunk on the prequel ending, will they remake LOTR in Australia representing MiddleEarth?

No, they will cut together old footage.

Is there an actual goal?

The goal is to find a question which results in 42. 

How can I effectivly annoy an entire fanbase with one sentence?

Take a fan, switch it on, and keep throwing in it the same sentence.

Why 35645 is better than 49857?
